name: Hajrudin
text:
Activate: Main
You may rest 1 of your Leaders: Reduce the cost of up to 1 of your opponent's Characters by -4 during this turn.

effect.text: Reduce the cost of up to 1 of your opponent's Characters by -4 during this turn.

meta.notes: Rarity is printed as 'C' in the bottom right corner. The card is a sample, but all fields are extracted from the visible text and layout.
